description: Learn how to make soda bread with this recipe that features spiced buckwheat, rolled oats and sultanas. It's best served sliced and drizzled with honey.
keywords: Soda bread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Bonus,Tree nut free,Egg free,Baking,Sep 2021,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Spiced Buckwheat & Oat Soda Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup bread & pizza plain flour (plus extra for dusting)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Reserve 1 tsp oats. Combine flours, sultanas, bicarbonate of soda, mixed spice, salt and remaining oats in a large bowl. Add buttermilk and honey. Mix to form a soft dough. Transfer dough to a floured surface. Knead until smooth.

Shape dough into a ball. Place on baking tray. Flatten to form a 15cm round. Score a cross into top of loaf. Brush with extra buttermilk. Dust with extra flour and sprinkle with buckwheat and reserved oats. Bake for 30 minutes or until browned and bread sounds hollow when tapped. Set aside for 10 minutes to cool slightly. Slice and serve with extra honey.
